intro: Dasymaschalon yunnanense, commonly known as Yunnan dasymaschalon, is a flowering plant native to China, specifically the Yunnan province. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants commonly known as buckwheats. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, greenish-white flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
